SEARCH
Package com.project.moviebooking.config

Class RedisConfig

java.lang.Object
com.project.moviebooking.config.RedisConfig
@Configuration @EnableCaching public class RedisConfig extends Object
Configuration class responsible for setting up and configuring Redis for caching purposes within the movie booking application.
